channel.title: Ed Holder
channel.description: Recent news about Ed Holder, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Just met with MPs of Transport Committee in Ottawa re: rail safety + the tragedy of Lac Megantic. Prayers + condolences to the families.
